txt.en: 'The winds out of Angmar are unnaturally cold and bring a deathly chill to the Lumi-väki.'
'Hunting for us is not only a test of strength and courage; it is a matter of life and death.'
'If our food stores continues to dwindle, what will become of us? The thought chills me to the marrow.'
'The arrival of this deadly cold and the increased boldness of the Susi-väki are no coincidence, I fear.'
'The experienced hunter can often smell the peikko long before his eyes or ears confirm it.'
